version_description:
Support for iPhone X
Onboarding screen bug fix
Loading data screen bug fix

1. Application navigation improvements
2. Conversion of degrees Fahrenheit to Celsius
3. Added user Settings View
4. Added FAQ View
5. Pinch-To-Zoom added to every screen
Tab bar bug fix relating to new screen sizes.

• Programmable hydration and rest reminders
• English/Spanish translation convenience features
• Additional frequently asked questions

• Security Updates
• Terms of Use Updates

• Support for dark mode
• Screen related bug fixes
